plot: A Naval Academy's school for girls is training women to use special gifts known as 'Virgin Energy' to stop fears of another Russo-Japanese war from coming to Japan.
title: Seishôdô kantai bâjin furîto
plot_es: A Naval Academy's school for girls is training women to use special gifts known as 'Virgin Energy' to stop fears of another Russo-Japanese war from coming to Japan.
plot_en: A Naval Academy's school for girls is training women to use special gifts known as 'Virgin Energy' to stop fears of another Russo-Japanese war from coming to Japan.
